enhanced_description: Peoplehum is an award-winning Human Capital Platform, recognized with the 2019 Global Codie award, designed for a complete multi-generational employee experience across the entire employee lifecycle, from hiring to performance, engagement, and HRMS. This intuitive, agile, and integrated platform is powered by machine learning and automation, offering features such as Single Sign-On (SSO) and support for hybrid work models. Key functionalities include an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) for automated hiring and streamlined candidate experiences, a comprehensive HRIS to manage employee information, leaves, time & attendance, and shifts with self-service tools, and an automated payroll system that simplifies processing, payments, and compliance.
